summary: A comprehensive test suite exercising the MAPDL gRPC client implementation, covering channel creation, error handling, data download/upload, input/output processing, and various edge‑case scenarios to validate correct behavior of the remote simulation service.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the ANSYS MAPDL remote simulation interface accessed via gRPC, ensuring that data transfer, command execution, and error propagation work as expected for end‑users of the engineering simulation platform.
